EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-03-08-Cloud Optimization Survey.Whitepaper Send.Cloud Migration Survey -
EmailTemplate.subject: [Free Whitepaper] How to Plan and Execute a Smooth Cloud Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for participating in our Cloud Optimization Survey and requesting a copy of our new whitepaper.
You may access your copy here: How to Plan and Execute a Smooth Cloud Migration <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-cloud-migration/]]>.
If you have any additional questions about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, please feel free to schedule a meeting with us <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]>.
I hope you enjoy the whitepaper!
Best, Elizabeth
